author: Emiliard Usoevski

text: Been playing this game a lot lately, I'm loving it! I just reached Chinatown and immediately liked this theme. If you like Deus Ex and want more of it, just get this game. It plays almost exactly the same way, the gameplay/structure/branching paths, etc. The soundtrack helps create a very dark atmosphere, it's the kind of game where I'm just glad I'm not living in that world. They really nailed the depressing feel of a bleak version of Los Angeles.
author: SupraDarky

text: What? I would love to live in that world.
